imagingbook.pub.color.edge

Class CannyEdgeDetector

  • java.lang.Object
    • imagingbook.pub.color.edge.ColorEdgeDetector
      • imagingbook.pub.color.edge.CannyEdgeDetector

  • public class CannyEdgeDetector
extends ColorEdgeDetector
    This class implements a Canny edge detector for grayscale and RGB images. The edge detector is "lazy" in the sense that it performs local non- maximum suppression and edge tracing only when the results are explicitly asked for (by the methods getEdgeBinary() and getEdgeTraces()).
    Version:
    2017/04/13
